amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer funds from the BLM Land acquisition account to the National Parks Service maintenance backlog account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-830 to transfer funds from the BLM Land acquisition account to the NPS Parks Maintenance Backlog.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 237, 1 Present (Roll no. 341).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 237, 1 Present (Roll no. 341).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Biggs.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
